tasks.title: Add dependencies to Cargo.toml
tasks.body: Add reqwest for HTTP, serde for JSON parsing, chrono for date/time, and toml for config parsing. Also add tokio for async runtime.

tasks.title: Implement auth.json credential loading
tasks.body: Parse ~/.codex/auth.json to extract access_token, refresh_token, and account_id. Handle both OAuth tokens and OPENAI_API_KEY format. Support CODEX_HOME environment variable.

tasks.title: Implement Codex usage API client
tasks.body: Create HTTP client to fetch from /backend-api/wham/usage endpoint with Bearer auth and ChatGPT-Account-Id header. Parse response with plan_type, rate_limit (primary_window, secondary_window with used_percent, reset_at, limit_window_seconds), and credits. Support custom base URL from config.toml.

tasks.title: Implement usage pace calculation
tasks.body: Calculate pace from rate window: expected_used_percent based on elapsed time in window, delta = actual - expected. Determine stage (onTrack, slightlyAhead, ahead, farAhead, slightlyBehind, behind, farBehind) based on delta. Calculate ETA to 100% usage and willLastToReset flag.

tasks.title: Create boxart/unicode display UI
tasks.body: Render usage display with box drawing characters (┌─┐│└┘). Show: 5-hour window (used_percent, reset time), weekly window (used_percent, reset time), pace indicator (stage, delta%, ETA). Use color/styling for pace stages (green for onTrack/ahead, yellow for slightly off, red for behind). Display plan_type and credits if available.

tasks.title: Implement main CLI entry point
tasks.body: Load credentials, fetch usage, calculate pace, render display, exit. Handle errors gracefully (auth not found, API errors, network issues). Exit with appropriate codes.

tasks.title: Test CLI with real credentials
tasks.body: Run codex-usage with valid credentials from ~/.codex. Verify 5-hour window, weekly window, and pace calculations are correct. Test error cases (no auth.json, expired token).
